Uoft_masters
27 June 2020

I was part of the Network Architecture group at U of T, under the supervision of Prof. Alberto Leon-Garcia. My research mainly focused of developing a secure autoscaling solution for applications that utilize both microservices and monolithic architectures. My Masters Thesis: Autonomic Management System on SAVI-IoT. Bonus for anyone who finds the Game of Thrones reference in my thesis.

Rajsimman Ravichandiran
